summary: Human Blood for Vampire and Cannibals (multilingual [DE, EN])
descriptionHtml:
Also available at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21575]Steam Workshop[/url]

This mod is multilingual [DE, EN].
The Mod (v1.1) works with Dawnguard, not tested without it
Old mod v1.0 works fine with vanilla Skyrim.


Please endorse this mod if you like it.

[color=green][b][u]Version 1.0[/u][/b][/color]
Babette from the Dark Brotherhood sells five Bottles of Blood per day.
Also it is craftable at the cookpot (needs one rare Human Heart) if you don't have access to DB for some reason.

What it does:
[list][*]If you are a Vampire, the potion will work equivalent to feeding on human blood.[*]And/Or if you are a Cannibal, that means you have finished Namira's Daedric-Quest, the potion will fortify your stamina regeneration (as addition to the spells of Namira's Ring).[*]If your are none of them, the potion will have no effect on you.[/list]

[color=yellow][b]Bugs:[/b][/color]
None so far, please report if you find some.

[color=yellow][b]Install:[/b][/color]
Copy the "data" folder from the archive to your Skyrim directory.
If asked to overwrite, say yes.
Start the Skyrim launcher, go to "Data Files" and make sure the files are activated.

[color=yellow][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color]
Delete the BloodBank.esp from your "...\Skyrim\data" directory.
author: johnwayne1930

files.name: Blood Bank
files.changelogHtml:
decreased cost
changed the model and textures to equal the Dawnguard one
slightly changed the Vampire boni
